title: Caretakers
description: All around us, people in our communities take care of different things. What would we do without a road worker, a vet, a dentist, and a police officer? Students will understand that everything, from pets to people to roads, needs care.
reviewWords: babysitter, dentist, firefighters, gardener, police officers, road worker
awareness: Short Vowels                : Discriminate the short /i/ vowel sound
phonics: Short Vowels : Associate the letter Ii with the short /i/ vowel sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and read high-frequency words a, is, and this
